transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Hello, haan ji.
Executive: Good evening. Mayank ji baat kar rahe hain Nand Lal Rupesh Kumar se?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Mayank sir, Naveen baat kar raha tha main IndiaMART se. Woh call kiya tha shayad uss din busy the aap, baat nahi ho paayi thi.
Customer: Haan, haan, woh thode chinta ke saath busy the.
Executive: Haan, right sir, that time you were busy sir. Sir, Mayank sir, I hope abhi hum discuss kar sakte hain IndiaMART ki jo services aapki chal rahi hain.
Customer: Haan ji. Usko maine review kiya tha sir. Abhi IndiaMART pe aap maximizer chala rahe hain jiski service ki end date 4 November ki thi sir.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Yes. I hope aap jaante hain Mayank ji ki aapka service jo hai woh expire ho chuka hai.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Okay. Mayank sir, yeh maximizer ka renewal jo hai woh aap kaise karenge sir?
Customer: Sir, hamare yaha na ek mela chal raha hai Gopal Mattan ka, aapko bhi pata hoga.
Executive: Kya chalta hai sir?
Customer: Yaha pe mela, Gopal Mattan ka.
Executive: Mela?
Customer: Haan, yaha mela chalta hai, Punjab se log aate hain yaha pe. Yaha pe snan karne aate hain, mela. Toh usme na hamara material gaya hua hai kaafi sara.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Toh yeh teen se char din ka hota hai, teen se char din ka.
Customer: Aur char din baad ek din lete hain waha pe log khali karne ke, yani samaan wapas lekar aate hain na.
Customer: Achha.
Customer: Aur ek din lete hain woh payment dene ke.
Customer: Achha. Itna material bik jata hai, bik jata hai, nahi toh wapsi lekar aate hain, paise de dete hain hamare.
Customer: Achha, achha. Next week mein main aapki renewal karwa lunga.
Executive: Okay, Mayank sir, waise dekhiye aap hi jaante hain kyunki aap business kar rahe hain sir toh paisa roz aata hai aur nikalta hai sir. Aapki priority bani hogi.
Customer: Nahi nahi, is time toh mele mein se zyada nahi raha sir, is time toh material jaa raha hai. Kyunki is time kya karte hain ki woh material le lete hain. Daba ke yani daba jaise aapke paas yani ek ton maal hai na, toh ek ton ke ek ton le jaate hain. Agar 200 kilo bika, 300 kilo bika, baaki maal wapas le jaate hain.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Haan, toh is time toh main maal kharid aur pichle factory wale is time nagad dete hain. Kyunki unhe pata hai maal toh bikna hi bikna hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Haan, toh ek hafte ki baat hai, agle hafte main renewal karwa lunga.
Executive: Sir, dekhiye Mayank sir, main aapko yeh clear bata raha hu, obviously sir, agle hafte ka samay toh hamare paas nahi hai. Hum agar chahenge bhi toh hold karna toh hamare paas ek ya do hi din hota hai sir. Service aapki jo hai na do din se grace pe chal rahi hai.
Customer: Toh aisa karo sir, Wednesday tak hold jao, Wednesday tak. Mere paas payment aayegi. Chalo maan lo ek ek aadha din. Toh yeh hafta ho gaya na sir phir.
Customer: Nahi, aaj kya waala hai? Aaj Friday hai kya hai?
Executive: Aaj Thursday hai sir. Ek second. Theek hai. Aaj 6 tarikh hai aur aaj Thursday hai.
Customer: Thursday hai. Haan. Wednesday ko aapko renewal payment ho chuki hogi.
Executive: Sir, Wednesday phir wahi saat din ho jayega sir. Aaj che din ho jayenge lekin kya karu sir is time, is time toh main bhi majboor hu batao. Agar aap cancel bhi kar doge tab bhi main Wednesday se pehle nahi karwa paunga. Wednesday main karwata hu Friday ko, Wednesday main karwata hu Friday ko.
Executive: Main nahi rakhunga. Mujhe pata hai aapko renew karna hai lekin hota hai na Mayank ji dekhiye time pe agar hum uss cheez ko renew kare toh uska fayda hota hai sir.
Customer: Toh aap kya karo main mail le lo, taki aap aage senior ko dikha sako.
Executive: Main yeh nahi keh raha tha Mayank sir. Yeh keh raha hu Mayank sir, isko Wednesday na karke sir isko aap Monday kariye taki main kuch samajh ke yaha pe time lekar isko Monday ke liye kar paunga.
Customer: Monday ko toh material jaa raha hoga uss time bhi. Kam se kam Wednesday tak ka de do, Wednesday ko main cooperate karwa lunga, chahe mere se mail le lo.
Executive: Sir, theek hai, ek kaam kariye sir, main aapko proposal bana ke bhej deta hu. Aapka jo proposal ki validity hai Wednesday toh nahi rakh paunga, Tuesday rakh lijiye sir, itna kariye. Tuesday kar lijiye ek din pehle, 11 tarikh tak.
Customer: Aaj raat tak ka, aaj raat tak ka time dijiye, main ek baar ghar waalo se discuss kar leta hu.
Executive: Kya bol rahe hain sir?
Customer: Main ek baar aaj raat tak ka time de do, main unhe kehta hu na ki Tuesday ko renewal karwane waaste.
Executive: Haan haan. Haan, toh aap renewal kariye na Mayank ji.
Customer: Are renewal toh karna hai lekin ghar mein discuss toh karna padta hai na ji. Check mein sign toh papa ke hi hote hain.
Executive: Toh Mayank sir aap hi owner hai yaha pe?
Customer: Nahi, owner mere papa hai. Yani yeh jo baaki yeh 12 12 ka jo kaam hai na.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Iski yani haan na karna mere haath mein hai.
Executive: Achha matlab wo kaam aap dekh rahe hain.
Customer: Haan, yeh sara main main hi dekhta hu. Lekin end mein jo faisla hota hai na, end mein jo faisla hota hai woh papa ka hi hota hai. Owner wohi hai. Haan, lekin sara kaam main kar dekhta hu.
Executive: Achha, toh matlab wahi cheez hai, same aap mutual decision leke isko pay karenge. Right?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Aur mujhe nahi lagta sir koi aisi dikkat aayegi sir kyunki aap service toh chala hi rahe hain aur IndiaMART se aapko business bhi ho hi raha hai.
Customer: Toh mujhe aaj raat tak ka time dijiye, main aapko kal tak reply karta hu.
Executive: Theek hai, koshish kariye sir agar kuch payment arrange ho jati hai toh isko kara dijiye kyunki service grace pe hai sir. Do din se hi grace pe chal rahi hai aur aisa na ho sir service close ho jaye toh better ki hum pehle isko renew kar le, toh zyada achha hoga sir.
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai? Okay, okay sir.
Customer: Okay, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to renew maximizer subscription.

- Needs time till Wednesday for payment.



Resolution:

- Executive will send a proposal.

- Proposal validity extended till Tuesday.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will confirm by tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, renewal, payment, maximizer
